rows.label: bf11280100_0015
rows.name:
The returning hero, pacifier of the borderlands,
was really just...

rows.label: bf11280100_0020
rows.name:
Never before has a Blade broken free
and rampaged like this.

rows.label: bf11280100_0030
rows.name: I can see why Acedia would prefer to keep it quiet

rows.label: bf11280100_0040
rows.name:
They're even routing support to the
militia through Avaritia for deniability.

rows.label: bf11280100_0070
rows.name: Surely if you defeat Metsu, your cover will be blown.

rows.label: bf11280100_0080
rows.name:
"If", indeed.
But we're not in it for the glory, are we?

rows.label: bf11280100_0090
rows.name: When we're done, I'll just plow my fields in peace.

rows.label: bf11280100_0105
rows.name:
Some of our troops have returned to
base, but...

rows.label: bf11280100_0130
rows.name:
A marauding group of routed mercenaries,
trying to avoid any attention.

rows.label: bf11280100_0150
rows.name:
There's not much around here for them in the way of
paid work or opportunities for looting...

rows.label: bf11280100_0160
rows.name:
As Your Majesty commanded,
our men did not engage.

rows.label: bf11280100_0170
rows.name: We confirmed their bearing, then withdrew.
